text.__SUMMARY__: The greenish naked-backed fruit bat (Dobsonia viridis) is a species of megabat in the family Pteropodidae.
text.Distribution:
This species of Dobsonia is endemic to some of the northeastern Lesser Sunda Islands in Indonesia.
It is found on: the Kai Islands; the central and southern Molucca Islands − including Seram Island, Ambon Island, and Buru Island; and the Banda Islands.
